ygData.subject: Re: Merry Christmas! Happy New Year!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you too and to everyone else on the list! *************************** Azor Spellbound Lvl 24 Human Cleric of The Rathe
ygData.messageBody:
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year to you too and to everyone else on the
list!

***************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 24 Human Cleric of The Rathe
***************************


> From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
>
> Like to wish every one a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! I am off on
> holidays for 2 weeks, so I won't be able to waste my work time reading
this
> list for a while :) Thanks for all the cool info and tips, and look
forward
> to reading when I get back.
>
> Hope we can all tear oursleves away from EQ at least on Christmas Day to
> spend some time with our families ( I know it will be hard, but come on,
> we're strong) :)
>
> Any hoo, hope to see you in game!
>
> Felize Navidad
> Joyeux Noel
> Happy Kwanza
> Happy Channukah (sp?)
> Good Ramadan
>
> Happy Y2K!
>
> Brytewing, Cleric of Bristlebane, The Rathe.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rob Berryhill [mailto:racefan@...]
> Sent: 1999/12/23 3:12 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] RE: Another Question
>
>
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> It does 585 for me at 44.
>
> Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
> SCARAB on Solusek Ro
>
